item.title: Vaccinations Matter (aka Why Anti-Vaxxers Should Really Reconsider)
item.description: Few things frustrate me more than seeing anti-lockdown protestors, anti-vaxxers, or those who believe that vaccines somehow infringe upon their personal freedoms. The value of vaccination should be self-evident to anyone with even a shred of common sense.
